location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 17: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche reports on peace negotiations between England, France, Holland, America and Spain. He relays information regarding the preparation of a French armed expedition at Nice. In addition, Edward Galley is informed that Monsieur Andre, a French botanist, is proceeding to Bushire, with the intention of travelling to inland Persia.
